body_html:
I also would like to see how much of extra build the test infra has to do with kafka support default on.
This is pretty important as we are at the scale of 10s of thousands of CPUs. What is the extra sources we have to build with kafka default on? If it adds aa lot, I wold still go for turning it off and letting people enable it conditionally.

@martinwicke how do you feel about having the apache kafka support on by default?
